QuestData.Title: Millie's Garden
QuestData.Description:
Alma came by earlier and gave Millie some flower seeds to plant out in the garden.
I love that our daughter is taking an interest in gardening, but I don't have time to wash her dress when she gets it covered in mud again!
Would you help her with the digging so that she doesn't get too dirty?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use your shovel to till $1oa Untilled Soil.
